## Problem Statement

A clear description of the problem or need this feature would address.

Example: "I'm frustrated when [...]" or "It would be helpful to [...]"

Describe your proposed solution or feature.

## Use Case

How would you use this feature? What workflow would it enable?

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.
